title: The Planet
overview: Is the earths system disrupted beyond its normal limits? What will the world look like in the future? The planet It is the most extensive documentary project ever produced in Scandinavia. Addressing the ultimate issue of how to cope with the future of our world. The planet is a wake-up call.  The movie draws on some of the observational strategies of Godfrey Reggio's Koyaanisqatsi, allowing us to reflect on patterns and phenomena of human and natural existence from both intimate and sweeping viewpoints.
